class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        pathLengths=[]
        roads=[[1,True] for i in range(n-1)]
        currLength=n-1
        for query in queries:
            if roads[query[0]][1] and query[1]-query[0]>roads[query[0]][0]:
                tempLength=query[0]
                cnt=0
                while tempLength<query[1]:
                    cnt+=1
                    roads[tempLength][1]=False
                    tempLength+=roads[tempLength][0]
                currLength-=cnt-1
                roads[query[0]][1]=True
                roads[query[0]][0]=query[1]-query[0]
            pathLengths.append(currLength)
        return pathLengths
